I love these pants I got them in two colors. They are super comfy and feel like sweats but look a little more elevated.

These pants are amazing! Such nice lounge wear but definitely cute enough to wear out. Great quality and very comfortable! I always get so many compliments when I wear them.

These pants are very comfortable, like pajamas, but they look nice enough to wear out and about. The only downside is that the fabric snags easily so I'm not sure how long they will last. But overall, they are good quality for the price point!

The elastic waist is very comfy and as someone with wide hips, I think these were really flattering. Very disappointed. I just want what I bought in green in the color black. Also bought the khaki version. Will see what material I get with those ones….

Good pants and comfortable. Extremely high waisted. Have to roll down once. Fabric is very thin but that’s what I wanted so worked for me. It’s also ribbed. Size medium fit great, 160 pounds.

评论概述: Exactly what I was looking for

These are very light weight, almost like a waffle material, not see-through. Ankle length. Cute detail at the bottom and nice pockets. Waistband stretches nicely. True to size. I’m 5’6” and a pant size 10-12. I ordered a L. I’m very pleased with them and I’m going to buy more colors! I recommend!

these are cute and comfy! they’re pretty soft and decently thick. also love that the waistband is tight but has a lot of stretch

In my opinion, I would topic wear a Medium in lounge pants, but these are baggy in style so they were HUGE. The waist band fit fine since it was elastic, but I’ll return for a small. Overall fabric and shape were as expected.

I may need to buy several pairs just to make sure I have a back up in case they stop selling. They are comfy and easy to wash. The elastic can be a little annoying but not a deal breaker at all. They aren’t warm but I live in Texas so that’s not really important. I’d love a pair of pants in this pattern made out of a sweatpant material for cooler days tho.

Item arrived super fast - gotta love that! The tulip hem is what sold me - how great these would be for an upcoming vaca! Didn’t realize how ribbed the pants are based on photos. They were soft and comfy. However way to long on my 5’4” body. Even when I rolled the waist band, still too long.

This is my 3rd pair of these sweatpants. I have them in black, green and pink. Now I need the cream colored ones next! They are soooo comfortable, I love that they’re ribbed as it makes them look cuter. The cut at the bottom of the pants makes for a unique and trendy look.  I ordered a size up on my last two pairs because the elastic waist band from my first pair felt a little tighter than I’d like, I think because the waist band is thick. However not a big deal that was really just personal preference for me as they did fit, I just wanted them looser. I’m sure I’ll own every color by the end of the winter!  I’m 5’3” and the length is to the floor without hitting it. If you’re taller these may not be as long as you’d like them to be.
I love love love them and want in every color. I wish there was a multi-pack

I bought these in two colors. Stylish and comfy. You can dress up or down. Highly recommend. I am a size 4 and I bought the Small. Fits great, tiny tight on the hips, but I have wider hips. Would get a Medium for extra comfort, but think the Small is great for a more dressed-up fit

i am obsessed with these pants!!! they are so cute with a form fitting top like i am wearing here or a bagging sweatshirt. i’ve gotten so many compliments on them and truly want them in so many other colors! love the big pockets and the ribbed design. not to mention the cut on the bottom!
So cute! Got so many compliments. My fav lounge pants
Everything about these is perfect! Love the oversized look, waist is super stretchy! I’m usually a med but ordered a large so they would be baggier

Amazing fit and super cute. I am 5'9 and about 143lb got size M and it is the perfect length and fit. Super cute and can be casual or dressed up.

These are not high quality fabric or manufacturing but good enough for casual wear and a very cute style. The elastic waist is a little tight. They are designed to ride high, so fine for me, but maybe someone with a larger waste and narrow hips might not be as comfortable.

评论概述: Adorable fit overall. VERY tight waistband

These are flowy, comfortable and lightweight. Worried that they would be too baggy especially in the butt but they’re not. Love them and highly recommend them. Just bought my third pair. I have them in khaki, blue and now pink!
Ended up returning. In my opinion, they were not as flattering in person.
So comfy and easy to wear!

These pants make me so sad because I really love the fit so much, but for the price and based on the photos I expected a thicker material, they’re such a thin ribbed fabric you can see through it, definitely not good for the colder months, they’re worth about half of what they’re priced here since they’re just pajama pants with what they’re made out of
These are so insanely cute and comfortable. I am so excited about these. Stretchy waist band, breathable material and so versatile. They are perfect sizing and a great product for the pricing!
love these pants. They feel like sweat pants but nice for casual outings too!

I love these pants a little too much! I would wear them 24/7 if I could. They’re soft and cozy. The perfect amount of baggy. The waist band is thick but not too thick that it rolls up. Super cute and comfortable. I did have to send back and size down one size. Will buy more colors!

Not cropped if you are short (5'4").  Also, the ribbed material make your thighs rub together if you have larger thighs and are walking a lot.

Want to look cute and put together while still being comfortable? These pants are my new fav and go to. Will be purchasing in more colors. Love the fit and how versatile they can be. The material is soft, breathable, and just a great quality overall!
I'm 4’5” 110lbs. 25 in jeans. The xs worked perfectly. I love these! Easy to dress up or down.

评论概述: I had high hopes for these, but was disappointed.
评论详情: I bought these after seeing them on one of my favorite “influencers”, but I’m now 99% sure that they’re actually wearing the name brand (and expensive) Free People/Anthro/etc. and they’re showing you similar “dupes”. Because they’re never quite the same as they are when these girls do their “Amazon hauls”. I’m literally thinking of applying for an Amazon LTK link because I am ALL about those dupes and I get dozens of Amazon packages a week. 😅 Oops.  So- the pants. I ordered my regular size, an XS, and the first thing I wish it had was a drawstring waist. Also, the inseam from the elastic to the crotch is extremely long, which is usually great for me because I have a long torso, but they just didn’t fit right whether they were on my hips or on my waist. They were also a bit scratchy, definitely not the super soft pants you want to lounge around in, but maybe washing would help?  I did like the color and the deep pockets, and I loved the tapered overlapping bottom, which gave them some cute boho style. They’re breathable, which is great for my AZ “fall/winter” season when it could be 98 degrees or it could be 49.  Unfortunately I will be returning and looking for something similar, because a girl can NEVER have enough cute lounge pants!
I love the look of these pants. They are super comfortable and look great on. Unfortunately after wearing them only a few times, the material is pilling and snagging.

These don’t just run big, they run huge. I am pregnant and ordered a medium thinking they would fit decently.. they are still MASSIVE! I would say they fit like a large or extra large. Other than that the quality is not terrible. Definitely light weight which is really nice! & they aren’t see through!
These pants are huge almost look like a skirt. I’m returning these
Size up if you want them to fit like pictured

I wanted to love these pants so bad because they seem like they would be super comfortable. I am 5'4 and I looked ridiculous. They were not cropped enough on me and were way too big

These pants are about ankle long and I wear them high waisted past my belly button. They fit perfectly and are super comfortable. They’re definitely a FP look alike for less! I bought in 2 colors already.

These pants are super comfortable. They are great to wear while traveling or for a comfy day at home. They will not necessarily work in a business casual way.

The pants are very comfortable, but the first pair we bought came with a stain on them so we had to return them. We did buy a second pair, but unfortunately, when they were washed a couple of times some weird discoloration showed up. My daughter now wears them just to lounge around the house.
I loved the look of the model pictures! But I look like a genie! Lol maybe if I would do a small , they wouldn’t be as baggy on  me!  I would size down if you get them!

I am 5ft 8in tall and weight 144 pounds. I wear a size 8 jeans. I got the medium and they fit perfect. They are nice and loose and have a good length. I have not washed them yet, so hopefully they wash well.

评论概述: Not as cute if you're short; took a bit to receive.
评论详情: I ordered the coffee color, very nice. Note that the waist seems particularly high waisted for a casual waffle pant. Shipment took 2 1/2 weeks from order date to receive. I consider that long for Amazon Prime. True to size, nice, medium weight waffle fabric. Super cute tulip hem, but didn't really show since I am only 5'2. It's possible when washed they would shrink to a good length, but I had no room for them to shrink elsewhere. Returned. My return shipping did not have a drop-off point option, only USPS, but I didn't pay for it.

The material looks cheap right away. I was excited for these based off of the reviews but definitely not worth more than $15. I will be returning since they were at least 30 but if they were cheaper i probably woukd just keep as pj’s. They’re also a little see through
So comfy and cozy for lounging or even as pajama pants.
Shipping took over a month. Pants are soft I do feel like they are on the pricey side for the quality I ordered a large they are true to size.
These pants are so cute! They’re very soft, can be worn high waisted or rolled for a lower fit. I’m 5’4 and the length was perfect! I bought a medium for a looser fit.
These pants are very cute. Very comfortable. I wish I would have ordered the medium, but the large work ok. I’ll keep them. I’m 5’9” and 167 lbs for reference.
Too tight in waist but too long

Loved these pants so much in khaki I just got a second pair in blue & going to buy them again for my lil sis for her birthday! Super comfortable and very flattering. They drape so well as a wide leg pant and offer a cool silhouette. I’m 5’10 ~138lbs usually between a S & M. Went with medium because I wanted a comfortable waistband & they are perfect. Super high rise and hit me right above the ankle. Highly recommend.
The elastic band is way too tight. I’m 5’8 150lbs , got the medium , which is my regular size. However there is no way I can comfortably run an errand in these. Unfortunately I had to return.

Very comfortable and flattering fit, will likely buy another pair. I’m 5’9” and wear pant size 4 or 6 and the size medium fits well. Am wearing lower on my waist and the length hits at my ankles, which is longer than one of the model pics shown. If I wanted a high waisted fit, I would’ve sized down and they would hit above my ankles.
Waist elastic was very tight - overall material was very nice.
Love these pants i wear them all the time. Either at home or to work. They fit great have a nice length and love the barrel leg. Would recommend.
These pants were such a hit with my mom circle and then everyone bought them! Easy to pair with a cropped tee or bodysuit! Threw on earrings and sandals and it was a night out outfit!
i worn these pants once and i love the style they are comfortable but i just noticed after one wash there’s holes in them because of how cheap they are made
